ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The new version of Jonthan's Provocation
ygData.msgSnippet: One other thought -  will it stack with Niv s? Lago
ygData.messageBody:
One other thought - will it stack with Niv's?

Lago

> If we do in fact get the new Rune song for lvl 49, we may actually
> be able to tank when we need to. I will do some testing tonight myself,
> and
> see if it stacks with Verses of Victory or any of our other battle songs.
>
> I hate to say it, but maybe our persistant testing and posting has
> paid off finally. Matter of fact I wont say that, since VI will probably
> just nerf us again anyhow!
>
> Lago
>
> > So the new version of Jonthan's Provocation looks like it will help us
> > solo
> > blue mobs tremendously. If it still included the rune shield, soloing
> > would
> > be even easier coz there would be less downtime for healing.
> >
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
